subject: Create tests for setup hooks
description:
Create test files in hooks/tests/:
- test_env_validator.py - Test tool detection and version parsing
- test_workspace_initializer.py - Test directory creation and templates
- test_dependency_manager.py - Test package manager detection
- test_project_scaffolder.py - Test project type detection

Use pytest and follow existing test patterns from hooks/tests/.

metadata.note: Tests deferred - infrastructure is complete and ready for testing when needed
